name: deviantNAV v7 (rotane)
description:
Restores and tweaks many features of the navbar that is currently in beta. Feature list:
  • Message count and user menu back to the left
  • Slightly darker background and brighter text for better contrast
  • “Home” button removed
  • “Submit” button blends in with the rest of the menu
  • Tweaked Searchbar
More details here: http://fav.me/d80h7qf and here: http://fav.me/d830o6p

user.name: rotane
user.about: I like to write userstyles. Some of them i upload here, the majority of which are for deviantART.com

additional_info:
Version history:
v0.1.0 (September 25, 2014) Public release.
v0.2.0 (September 30, 2014) Fixes for new round of beta.
v0.2.1 (September 30, 2014) Text shadow as per screenshot.
v0.2.2 (September 30, 2014) Fix to some hover effects.
v0.2.3 (October 2, 2014) Another small fix to some hover effects.
v0.3.0 (October 20, 2014) Fix for Notes Count; Dropdowns align nicely; Upgrade link.
v0.3.1 (October 21, 2014) Fix for sta.sh page.
v0.4.0 (December 5, 2014) Preliminary fix for new logo.
v0.4.1 (January 21, 2015) Quick fix for promo items.
